website_summaries.verdict: For those looking to augment lean muscle growth, this is a tasty protein bomb.
pros: A huge hit of protein blasts muscles with a combination of soy, casein, and whey
Plus, 4 grams of fiber to move things along
Bar has a balanced texture that is slightly chewy, with a bit of crumble
Great chocolate flavor with little aftertaste
cons: All that protein and fiber has its price: gassy side effects for some

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for Meal Replacement
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these PowerBar Protein Bars. He uses them as a quick meal before wrestling matches. Says they help him feel full without added bulk. He loves the Chocolate Brownie flavor. Not too heavy or overpowering. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MDMK

customer_reviews.title: Diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: Something is wrong with this product! Diarrhea every time I have one of these. I bought two boxes so complete waste of money and hassle from getting sick with it when I try to consume one.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Ideal protein bar
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a meal replacement and also for part of my post work out meal.The taste is actually pretty good and ofcourse more filling that the 20g one. At times i drink it with some milk and it does the job. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deebo

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Good, But Cheap Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: The PowerBar Protein Plus Bar, Chocolate Brownie tastes good but the chocolate melts and chips off the bar too easily. Open the wrapper and the inside of it is coated with chocolate, then begin eating it and small pieces of chocolate fall off. I usually eat them over the sink or outside. It's too bad, they have a decent product but I will not be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great protein bar that doesn't taste awful
customer_reviews.text: It's not candy. It's not supposed to taste like a dessert, but it's close enough and doesn't have that mushy, gritty taste that a lot of protein bars have and you don't have to force yourself to eat it. I don't taste the chemical aftertaste that some people complain about. Maybe my taste buds aren't so attuned. All in all a great way to get 30 grams of protein.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wilson

customer_reviews.title: These aren't as good as a Hershey bar but they are much better ...
customer_reviews.text: These aren't as good as a Hershey bar but they are much better than many other protein bars on the market. My boyfriend says 'they don't taste as dirt-like as the others' and from him that is a great compliment.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Source of Protein
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item via Amazon's subscribe and save because it is so expensive at local retailers and they sell them as single bars and do not offer a discount if I purchase by the box. It's a great source of protein but the sugar is a little high but since it's my only sugar source each day it's not that big of an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Bar texture has changed?
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting these bars for years, excellent source of protein after a workout and... a chocolate treat :) They always used to have a soft brownie bar texture until my last order. That one was very dense, like chewing on a cardboard. I hope it's just a bad batch. Hopefully the next order will turn out to be more consistent with original ones. Then, I will come back and update the rating.
customer_reviews.author: audiobuffer

customer_reviews.title: Taste and texture
customer_reviews.text: are both good in these bars. Pleasantly chewy, just slightly dry, NOT like chewing a tire as some bars are and with enough chocolate taste to satisfy that craving. NO odd chemical aftertaste. Best kept cool in warm weather as the chocolate coating gets soft fairly easily. UPDATED: 4/15 A "new Improved" version of these bars appeared a few months ago. Taste maybe slightly better, but texture is softer less chewy, less satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: They taste pretty good but it's not delicious or anything
customer_reviews.text: Bought these so I have something to snack on late at night when I was hungry. They taste pretty good but it's not delicious or anything. Makes your mouth really dry so make sure you have a drink to go along with this
customer_reviews.author: Hudson

customer_reviews.title: NO Melting Bars!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered Tiger's Milk bars in both regular and king size on Amazon since I can't find them locally without paying an arm and leg for them. Amazon to the rescue! Even in the hot TEXAS weather they arrived in great shape - no melted bars! From the time I ordered until I received them was over a week, so between Amazon and UPS they got to me in good condition. These are perfect for snacks and I use the king size as a meal so I don't cheat on my diet.
customer_reviews.author: perfectpetals

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great and has good macros
customer_reviews.text: These taste so good, for a protein bar, they actually motivate me to get to the gym so I can have one afterwards. Very good balance of carbs, fat, and protein, and they're surprisingly filling for their size.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: lots of energy
customer_reviews.text: Good boost of energy for a long day, and tase pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: lifeguardpat

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a diet chocolate that tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Diabetic and I can eat. Very flavorful. Nice crunch and density, like a fudge brownie!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Char

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend them especially for aerobic activity
customer_reviews.text: I used this bar for rowing, as a lightweight rower, I had to stay at a certain weight, these bars are very filling, surprisingly thick, and heavy with protein; I highly recommend them especially for aerobic activity, for lifting you're better using higher protein powder though, keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: lloyder

customer_reviews.title: Treat Yourself
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing I've notice about this bar is that it has such a high caloric value, other than that, it is GREAT!! It tastes great, and sources well. Definitely buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: DrewDude

customer_reviews.title: great taste
customer_reviews.text: Another brand I bought religiously was discontinued so I tried these. They taste good and provide the protein I need after a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Good product, reasonable pricing.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, you cannot get these protein bars in as many stores as should be possible. Amazon can be relied upon to have what we need in this regard.
customer_reviews.author: Sue of Kalamazoo

customer_reviews.title: Great quick source of protein
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quick way to get protein into me after working out but I didn't like those horrible shakes so I gave these a try and they aren't too bad. There's a LIGHT little under taste that is a little odd but it's not enough to really bother or worry me. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Reizvoller

customer_reviews.title: Like the original better
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I prefer the original power bars. They don't ever make the wild berry flavor in the new version. Totally disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: sarhlynn456Top Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: My favorite PowerBar
customer_reviews.text: While I liked the older version of this PowerBar a little better, the "new and improved" version is almost as good. It's like a heavy version of the Nestles Hundred Thousand Dollar Bar.
customer_reviews.author: Mister K

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: These are probably my favorite tasting protein bars, almost like a candy bar. I did not have any issues with my box of bars being dried out or out of date. All of mine were fresh and delecious. Will order again once I am no longer tired of the same flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Justin A.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and 30 g of protein per bar.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. 30 g of protein and they taste good too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly MS

customer_reviews.title: Pack one for mid-day
customer_reviews.text: The are delicious, filling, and have a great amount of protein!
customer_reviews.author: paul kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and great price
customer_reviews.text: They sell these for 3 bucks a pop at Sheetz so I thought I'd get them from Amazon for much cheaper. These actually taste good and with all the protein, it's a win-win.
customer_reviews.author: DEH

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: Very filling and taste great. Like a nice moist brownie
customer_reviews.author: Liam D'Arcy

customer_reviews.title: I am going next time with isopure powder for my low carb diet.
customer_reviews.text: The carb count was a bit higher than what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. I use it to make sure I get enough protein when I am running around.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Packaged with other items should have had better cushion.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Lots of protein, but with that funky chalky taste ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of protein, but with that funky chalky taste. I am now buying the smaller, cheaper Power Bar in peanut butter/chocolate flavor, with 20g of protein in the 15 pack. Much more palateable.
customer_reviews.author: Geezerjock65

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, small, good!
customer_reviews.text: I got this at a coupon discount. I would usually prefer and buy this: "MET-Rx Big 100 Colossal Meal Replacement Bar" because it's cheaper ($1.74 per bar), with 32G of protein and a comprehensive nutrition value and it's quality too. So why did I purchase this? And why you should if you have these reasons: - There's an ongoing coupon discount. That brings it down to a competitive and comparative price. - It's smaller (faster to consume and convenient to bring around). - Lastly, this powerbar mainly focuses on protein. For those of you who only want to get protein out of a bar, this would be more suitable than the meal replacement bar.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES TAY

customer_reviews.title: Oh, these things are so good!!
customer_reviews.text: These are almost addictive they are so good! If they didn't have so much protein in them, I would call them candy bars! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Aeronut

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bar
customer_reviews.text: Love these protein bars. Taste like a real brownie and it has 30 grams of protein.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Rhine

customer_reviews.title: Long time customer, NO MORE...
customer_reviews.text: After being a multi-year customer, consuming these almost every day, I will not be buying any more of these. The company chose to "improve" it and in the process has RUINED it. They took a very yummy chocolate/brownie flavor and added crunchy texture/filler into the bar and took away a the creamy deep chocolate flavor. I feel like the only improvement they made was to reduce the manufacturing cost of the bars by adding filler in order to raise their bottom line. I'm as SO DISAPPOINTED that this product has been improved to the point of YUCK. The other flavors have similar filler. This is a brand I will no longer purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patti L Barcroft

customer_reviews.title: Good energy boost
customer_reviews.text: Have one before each sport activity: gym, surfing, swimming. Taste is OK, just doing enough liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this taste
customer_reviews.text: These taste so great and have so much protein. I love these as a snack and eat a little bit at a time throughout the day during work.
customer_reviews.author: BILLY AND ALLEY

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, good chocolate texture, and still the original formula. I bought these as well as a box of two flavors of their new formula, and this is definitely the best buy I made. Get these before they're gone!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Cheez

customer_reviews.title: 30g of protein :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious meal replacement bar. At 370 calories, and 30g protein, its a solid bar. Taste and texture work for me, but that's very personal, so YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wort

customer_reviews.title: Get it, eat it, love it, be happy.
customer_reviews.text: They taste good, and are allegedly healthy with all of the protein that they have. There seems to be confusion on the nutrition information. When I order these, I receive bars with 330 calories, 30g of protein, 40 carbs with 21g sugar, and 5g fiber. I won't tell you the calcium and iron content because that would be just too many spoilers. All this is for the delicious chocolate brownie flavored bars. I've purchased this product several times and the only complaint I have is that I keep running out. It's not necessarily hard for me to like a food product, because I like most food products... but this is one of them, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein bars! I like the protein amount, 30 grams per bar..
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Protein Bar at it's BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I will be a repeat buying customer on these bars! Luv the taste & texture of a chocolate brownie. No thick dry cardboard taste which comes along with high protein bars. This one gets my top vote!
customer_reviews.author: Jr

customer_reviews.title: Taste pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I use these as a meal replacement for one meal a day. It helps me to get enough protein and they taste pretty darn good. I had ordered them during the summer months and they were a bit melted when I got them, but other than that, I would def buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bar for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great protein bar. Tastes good and has the extra things needed to stay healthy while on a work out cycle. Ive tried quite a few and this is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: JakeFromAZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Taste great and a good source for a lot of protein.
customer_reviews.author: SWANIE

customer_reviews.title: terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: so much sugary taste in a protein bar i dont get it. had to brush my teeth afterwards, this is way too sweet and thick. hard to swallow as well.
customer_reviews.author: nzk

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the bars were excellent except for being melted in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Solid basic protein bar
customer_reviews.text: It's everything I expect from a protein bar. It just doesn't get 5-stars because the outside chocolate melts very easily, causing it to get slightly slimy towards the end of the bar. #FirstWorldProblems
customer_reviews.author: M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: used to buy these things at grocery stores but found this good priced package and had to buy a whole box. Same product for a cheaper price. . .
customer_reviews.author: IDGAF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting PowerBar - I look forward to eating it - can't say that about too many others!
customer_reviews.author: G. Kowalewsky

customer_reviews.title: tasty
customer_reviews.text: These are my excellent tasting and texture protein bars. They're high in protein, but unfortunately also high in fat and carbs.
customer_reviews.author: pao

customer_reviews.title: Watch out - 20g is nasty, 30g is great, easy to confuse...
customer_reviews.text: I went looking for the 30g Vanilla yogurt Protein Plus, rated '2' for 'during'. I accidentally bought the 20g Protein Plus (rated '3' for 'after'). They are very different in texture and taste. I love the 30g 'During', but the 20g 'after' is downright disgusting. Texture like sawdust, taste like playdough. Threw it out after one bite. Taste is an individual thing, but if you're looking for the 30g version, make sure you get what you're looking for. The Amazon heading says 30g, but when you select the flavor, it switches to 20g. Anyone want a free box?
customer_reviews.author: Eric K.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Sports Nutrition. Used it in combination with Power Bar gels at Ironman Florida
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eat this after a long run
customer_reviews.text: I just ran a 10 mile long run, and the 30 grams of protein, wrapped in a chocolate brownie, was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy protein fix for vegetarians
customer_reviews.text: I had been feeling tired, and a friend said since I'm a vegetarian maybe I'm not getting enough protein. I ordered these bars and have been eating one for breakfast everyday with water. They're decent tasting, not candy bar delicious, but edible. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I order these for my wife who is diabetic. Highest ratio of protein to carbs i could find.
customer_reviews.author: Cra P. Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: I keep these in my desk for days I can't fit lunch in at the office. Tastes great! ; )
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Good and cheaper than the convenience store
customer_reviews.text: This flavor is sometimes hard to find. I am glad Amazon carries this. It is a good value and very convenient to have it delivered
customer_reviews.author: McLin

customer_reviews.title: 30 grams of weigh in one little bar!
customer_reviews.text: The bar is packed with 30 grams of protein, and it tastes halfway decent. Brownies aren't my favorite, but these are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best meal bar out there
customer_reviews.text: It tastes great, has more protein the most meal bars, and helps me keep the proper weight on a regular basis
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, good load of protein
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product for a proteinful snack during the day. Definitely a little pricey for 12 bars but kind of worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Dalfino

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and great delivery
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. This flavor is even better than the others i bought. I work crazy hours and dont always get a balanced meal. These work well to either tide me over or fill in. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reading TechQueen

customer_reviews.title: I normally love these but I'll stick to buying them from Walmart
customer_reviews.text: These were 1 month from expiration when they showed up. They had a strange texture and flavor. I normally love these but I'll stick to buying them from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: matt jordan

customer_reviews.title: Worst tasting of the power bar series
customer_reviews.text: Worst tasting of the power bar series. Thought I was buying the peanut butter (which are great) but these showed up instead. Had one and then gave the rest of the box to my cousin - they are bad.
customer_reviews.author: Myyrdraal

customer_reviews.title: Don't change something that works
customer_reviews.text: They changed the recipe recently so it now tastes like sugar alcohol. Kinda gross. I will be canceling my bi-monthly subscription.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Vegetarians beware
customer_reviews.text: These dogs taste good and have a great chewy bite but I am a vegetarian and noticed that they contain beef gelatin. I guess that I shouldn't be eating them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing service wonderful and tasty product quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing service wonderful and tasty product quality. I called and after a week came to the house just wish unfortunately I'm trying to invite more flavors and Annie successful I get a message that you can not send this product to the state in which I found!
customer_reviews.author: avram vagdani

customer_reviews.title: Soy protein's a no-no and these are full of it
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a pretty good deal, pretty average bars on the higher end of the protein scale but there's one major drawback... first ingredient, SOY. That's a big NOPE, guys in particular should really try to stay away from soy at all costs. If they switch over to whey I'd buy these in a heartbeat. Also memory serves the chocolate brownie is disgustingly fakely sweet tasting.
customer_reviews.author: TR

product_meta.title: PowerBar Protein Plus Bar, Chocolate Brownie, 3.28 Ounce (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Chocolate Brownie| Size:12 Count (Pack of 1)

After leaving it all on the court, field, or gym, PowerBar Protein Plus bars are there, offering an excellent source of protein and superior taste to help post-workout muscles recover with ease.

Available in 5 delicious flavors: Vanilla, Chocolate Peanut Butter, Peanut Butter Cookie, Chocolate Mint Cookie, and Cookies and Cream.
feature_bullets: Each bar contains 30g protein and 5g fiber

Delivering high quality protein, a good source of fiber, and great taste in each bar, they are designed especially for everyday athletes, Enjoy the convenience of these grab and go bars to help replenish muscles and recover with ease post-workout or as a snack any time of day
NO ARTIFICIAL Colors or Flavors, NO Trans Fat, GLUTEN FREE

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
